typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(length(Column_1) <= 6,
	disjoint: true) ~> tenpoCheck@(tenpoOK, tenpoNG)
tenpoCheck@tenpoOK split(length(Column_2) <= 13,
	disjoint: true) ~> itemCheck@(itemOK, itemNG)
itemCheck@itemOK split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> tanaCheck@(tanaOK, tanaNG)
